cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
movie_description: Summary : When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

cast: Cast : Chanchal Chowdhury, Masuma Rahman Nabila, Partha Barua, Lutfur Rahman George
movie_description: Summary : A struggling actor becomes a professional impostor, hired to impersonate people for financial gain, but as he delves deeper into his work he becomes embroiled in trouble that threatens to unravel his life.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
movie_description: Summary : A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

movie_name: Title : The Silence of the Lambs
cast: Cast : Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Scott Glenn, Ted Levine
movie_description: Summary : A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

cast: Cast : Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey, Andrew Kevin Walker
movie_description: Summary : Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, Jack Nicholson, Mark Wahlberg
movie_description: Summary : An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

cast: Cast : Song Kang-ho, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong, Choi Woo-sik
movie_description: Summary : Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine
movie_description: Summary : After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

cast: Cast : Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, John Gavin
movie_description: Summary : A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

cast: Cast : Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello
movie_description: Summary : 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

cast: Cast : Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri, Stephen Baldwin
movie_description: Summary : The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

cast: Cast : James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Wendell Corey, Thelma Ritter
movie_description: Summary : A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

cast: Cast : Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
movie_description: Summary : During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway, Gary Oldman
movie_description: Summary : Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

cast: Cast : Choi Min-sik, Yoo Ji-tae, Kang Hye-jeong, Kim Byeong-Ok
movie_description: Summary : After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

cast: Cast : Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser
movie_description: Summary : Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

cast: Cast : Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
movie_description: Summary : A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

cast: Cast : Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Liubomiras Laucevicius, Vladas Bagdonas
movie_description: Summary : After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

cast: Cast : Ulrich Mühe, Martina Gedeck, Sebastian Koch, Ulrich Tukur
movie_description: Summary : In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

cast: Cast : Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Laughton, Elsa Lanchester
movie_description: Summary : A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

cast: Cast : Karthi, Narain, Arjun Das, George Maryan
movie_description: Summary : Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

cast: Cast : Toshirô Mifune, Yutaka Sada, Tatsuya Nakadai, Kyôko Kagawa
movie_description: Summary : An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

cast: Cast : Mohanlal, Meena, Ansiba, Esther Anil
movie_description: Summary : A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

cast: Cast : Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
movie_description: Summary : When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

cast: Cast : Cary Grant, Eva Marie Saint, James Mason, Jessie Royce Landis
movie_description: Summary : A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

cast: Cast : James Stewart, Kim Novak, Barbara Bel Geddes, Tom Helmore
movie_description: Summary : A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

cast: Cast : Kamal Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Fahadh Faasil, Narain
movie_description: Summary : A special investigator assigned a case of serial killings discovers the case is not what it seems to be, and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.

cast: Cast : Peter Lorre, Ellen Widmann, Inge Landgut, Otto Wernicke
movie_description: Summary : When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

cast: Cast : Fred MacMurray, Barbara Stanwyck, Edward G. Robinson, Byron Barr
movie_description: Summary : A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

cast: Cast : Yash, Sanjay Dutt, Raveena Tandon, Srinidhi Shetty
movie_description: Summary : In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

cast: Cast : Vishnu Vishal, Amala Paul, Radha Ravi, Sangili Murugan
movie_description: Summary : A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

cast: Cast : Mohanlal, Meena, Asha Sharath, Ansiba
movie_description: Summary : A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

cast: Cast : Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
movie_description: Summary : A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movie_name: Title : No Country for Old Men
cast: Cast : Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson
movie_description: Summary : Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley
movie_description: Summary : Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

cast: Cast : Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette, Olivia Williams
movie_description: Summary : Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

cast: Cast : Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson
movie_description: Summary : A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

cast: Cast : Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah, Michael Madsen
movie_description: Summary : After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

cast: Cast : Hugo Weaving, Natalie Portman, Rupert Graves, Stephen Rea
movie_description: Summary : In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

cast: Cast : Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger
movie_description: Summary : As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

cast: Cast : Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
movie_description: Summary : A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

movie_name: Title : The Secret in Their Eyes
cast: Cast : Ricardo Darín, Soledad Villamil, Pablo Rago, Carla Quevedo
movie_description: Summary : A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

cast: Cast : Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
movie_description: Summary : Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

directors: Director : Rahi Anil Barve, Anand Gandhi, Adesh Prasad
cast: Cast : Sohum Shah, Jyoti Malshe, Anita Date-Kelkar, Ronjini Chakraborty
movie_description: Summary : A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

cast: Cast : Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings, John Williams
movie_description: Summary : A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

cast: Cast : Ajay Devgn, Akshaye Khanna, Tabu, Shriya Saran
movie_description: Summary : A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

cast: Cast : Manoj Bajpayee, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Richa Chadha
movie_description: Summary : A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movie_name: Title : Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Movie: Mugen Train
cast: Cast : Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono
movie_description: Summary : After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

cast: Cast : Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa
movie_description: Summary : A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

cast: Cast : Tabu, Ayushmann Khurrana, Radhika Apte, Anil Dhawan
movie_description: Summary : A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.
